content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.tblnyctrips (
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    trip_duration_minutes FLOAT,
    VendorID BIGINT,
    passenger_count FLOAT,
    RatecodeID FLOAT,
    store_and_fwd_flag VARCHAR(10),
    PULocationID BIGINT,
    DOLocationID BIGINT,
    payment_type BIGINT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    airport_fee FLOAT,
    ingest_time DATETIME2,
    [source] VARCHAR(50),
    pickup_datetime DATETIME2,
    dropoff_datetime DATETIME2,
    passenger_bucket VARCHAR(20),
    ratecode_desc VARCHAR(50),
    payment_desc VARCHAR(50),
    taxi_type VARCHAR(20),
    [year] INT,
    [month] INT,
    tip_percent FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmph FLOAT,
    duration_bucket VARCHAR(20),
    net_revenue FLOAT,
    anomaly_flag BIGINT
) 
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'gold/trip-data',
	DATA_SOURCE = [nycadlssource],
	FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
)
